events.click: Emitted when the component is clicked

props.fixed: Forces component to take up all available space up to their maximum width (300px), and centers it.
props.stacked: Displays the tab as a flex-column.
props.sliderColor: Applies specified color to the slider when active on that component - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
props.hideSlider: Hides the active tab slider component (no exit or enter animation).
props.direction: Changes the direction of the tabs. Can be either `horizontal` or `vertical`.
